name: RATKING CHAPTER ZERO
description:
Journey the world of RATKING as SALARY MAN, as he learns to live a life off ZA clock...


  • EXPERIENCE a multitude of player choices and unique interactions!

  • EXECUTE realtime combos and perfect blocks!

  • FEED ZA BLADE with the CYBER JUICES of the RATKING!

  • RECRUIT party members!

  • DEVOUR the Inhabitants of RATKING! (But Be Wary, They Will Resist)

  • Become The SALARY MAN.

Additional Features:
Full controller/steam deck support!
Multiple Endings!
